articles.title: Trump and This Moment Are a Terrifying Mismatch
articles.description: He lacks the counsel, character and credibility to lead us into war.
articles.content:
Limited cognition? Dubious character? Those may not matter when youre choosing the gilt for a golf resort or skyscraper. They do when youre deciding whether to put American lives on the line.

Twenty years ago, Brad Rutter left the Jeopardy! studio having won more than $55,000 and two Chevy Camaros. Rutter hadnt lost a match, but at that time in the game shows history, contestants were kicked off after winning five straight games.

articles.author: Deborah Solomon
articles.title: John Baldessari: An Artist in a Class by Himself
articles.description: His visual style derives from a corner of life that we never even knew had a style — that is, the classroom.
